## Zebrafish proteome play :fish:

This repository quickly examine predicted antimicrobial peptides (AMPs),
predicted by [ampir](https://github.com/Legana/ampir) from the zebrafish proteome and compares it to known mammalian AMPs obtained from [UniProt](https://www.uniprot.org/):

- [Zebrafish proteome play](zebrafish_amps.md) : Rmd file [zebrafish_amps.Rmd](zebrafish_amps.Rmd)


*The zebrafish image used on the plot in this repository was obtained from [Wikimedia](https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:202101_Zebrafish.png)*
